meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one trillion ohms.
meanings.sent1: The circuit had a high resistance of one teraohm, making it difficult for the current to flow.
meanings.sent2: When measuring the resistance of the wire, the multimeter displayed a value in teraohms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lightning bolt refuse to pass through the teraohm wire? Because it was too resistant!
meanings.sent4: The teraohm barrier stood tall, blocking any electrical current from crossing.
meanings.sent5: The teraohm resistance was like a fortress, impervious to the electrical charge's advances.
